extensionDescription.message: This extension enables automatic prompt execution in the Google Gemini web app using additional URL parameters.

popupManuelCopy.message: Ctrl+C / Cmd+C: copy the last answer.

popupUrlGenerateRedirectUrlHelp.message: To prevent the prompt from being sent to Gemini without the extension, a secure verification page is inserted to check whether the extension is installed.

popupTrademarkGemini.message: Google Geminiâ„¢ is a trademark of Google LLC.

popupQueryWarning.message: Query parameters have been used. For security reasons, we recommend including URL parameters in the URL fragment (after #). Please use the 'Generate URL' button to create a secure URL.
